availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander A. McKendree (Allen County, Kentucky, hotel keeper.)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Sumner County, Tennessee, native. Married to Elvira H. House McKendree in Sumner County, Tennessee, on February 12, 1846. Father of William Henry McKendree, James N. McKendree, Mary A. McKendree, Sarah A. McKendree, and Alice G. McKendree. Farmer in Sumner County, Tennessee, in 1850. Hotel keeper in Allen County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed one enslaved person in Allen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States(1880), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Sumner County, District 13, p. 205B.
